scripts.fix: npm run fix:prettier && npm run fix:eslint
scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.build: npm run build:vite && npm run build:webpack
scripts.build:webpack: cp server/main.mjs dist/server/main.mjs && webpack -c ./webpack.config.js && rimraf dist/server
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run server:prod
scripts.prod: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run server:prod
